title: French prosecutors are investigating companies like Nestle and Danone over contaminated baby formula. Here's the latest
summary_full: A crisis over contaminated baby formula reached a flashpoint as Paris' public prosecutor said it opened investigations into five companies making it.
summary_public: A crisis over contaminated baby formula reached a flashpoint as Paris' public prosecutor said it opened investigations into five companies making it.

FR.label: neutral
FR.evidence: French prosecutors are investigating companies like Nestle and Danone
